BookData.Title: Paul Laurence Dunbar
BookData.TitleLong: Paul Laurence Dunbar: portrait of a poet
BookData.PublisherText: Berkeley Heights, NJ: Enslow Publishers, c2000.
BookData.Summary: A biography of the poet who faced racism and devoted himself to depicting the black experience in America.
BookData.Notes: "Works by Paul Laurence Dunbar": p. 113-114. Includes bibliographical references (p. 124) and index.
